snippet: One Latin American colleague said Lima saw Romney as "The stereotypical gringo, hard working, prejudiced, short-sighted, with a dangerous imbalance between might and mind."
abstract: One Latin American colleague said Lima saw Romney as "The stereotypical gringo, hard working, prejudiced, short-sighted, with a dangerous imbalance between might and mind."

headline.main: My Unscientific World Poll of Obama vs. Romney
